EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic and DXC Executive Partnership Update 01.15.2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Below please find our weekly Executive Partnership Update. As you can see, we are seeing tremendous momentum and activity. The teams across DXC and Turbonomic are driving hard to close the month strong and as always please let us know any questions or comments. Thanks, Greg
